details.title: Menu
details.description:
Our meals include a nutritious balance of protein, starch and vegetables and are low in sodium, sugar and fat. 
7.50 Hot Meal 
7.50 Frozen Meal 
4.00 Sandwich 
**Both hot and frozen meals include soup and dessert

details.title: Sign Up
details.description:
To have meals delivered or to pickup meals from our office, you need to create an account. You can setup an account by: 
1. Calling our office at 604-533-1679. The process takes less than ten minutes. 
2. Download the New Client Registration, complete the form and email it to mealdesk@lmow.ca.

details.title: Special Inquiries
details.description: If you require further information or subsidy please contact us at 604-533-1679

details.title: Pick Up and Delivery Options
details.description: We deliver meals Monday through Friday between 11:30am and 1:30pm. Meals can also be picked up at our office between noon and 2pm, Monday through Friday. We deliver to Langley City and the Township of Langley(including Aldergrove). * We do not deliver on statutory holidays *
